mapper.select: SELECT * FROM my_information i WHERE i.language_id = #{language_id} ORDER BY i.title ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM my_information
SELECT MAX(information_id)+1 AS information_id FROM my_information i
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_information(information_id, language_id, title, description, meta_title, meta_description, meta_keyword, sort_order, status) VALUES ( #{information_id}, #{language_id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{meta_title}, #{meta_description}, #{meta_keyword}, #{sort_order}, #{status} )
